casebody.data:
State
v.
Nashid Porter 153P16-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. May 23, 2016 Nashid Porter, For Porter, Nashid. Robert C. Montgomery, Special Deputy Attorney General, Ben R. David, District Attorney, For State of N.C.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 6th of May 2016 by Defendant to Appoint Counsel:

"Motion Dismissed as moot by order of the Court in conference, this the 23rd of May 2016."
